query.q: M::`postgresql_size`:(LAST(`total_size`) AS `disk usage`) { `table` = '#{table}' and `db` = '#{db}' and `host` = '#{host}' } BY `table`
M::`postgresql_index`:(LAST(`idx_scan`) AS `index scan`) { `table` = '#{table}' and `db` = '#{db}' and `host` = '#{host}' } BY `table`
M::`postgresql_stat`:(LAST(`n_live_tup`) AS `live rows`) { `table` = '#{table}' and `db` = '#{db}' and `host` = '#{host}' } BY `table`
M::`postgresql_stat`:(LAST(`n_dead_tup`) AS `dead rows`) { `table` = '#{table}' and `db` = '#{db}' and `host` = '#{host}' } BY `table`

query.content: This dashboard provides a high-level overview of your PostgreSQL databases, so you can track throughput, replication, locks, and other metrics from all your servers and spot potential issues.
